conbody.p: This part prescribes policies and procedures that apply requirements of the Privacy Act of1974 ( 5 U.S.C.552a ) (the Act) and OMB CircularNo.A-130, December12,1985, to Government contracts and cites the Freedom of Information Act ( 5 U.S.C.552 , as amended).
